Upgrade your living space with this modern and luxury single chair, a perfect blend of contemporary design and exceptional comfort. This  crafted piece is designed to provide a stylish and inviting relaxing solution for you in your home or place of work. Whether placed in your living room, bedroom, or office, this single sofa promises to enhance your space with its sophisticated appeal and premium quality.

Sleek and Contemporary Design

This luxury single chair features a sleek, minimalist design that effortlessly complements a variety of interior styles.

Premium Materials and Craftsmanship

  • High-Quality Upholstery: Available in premium fabric or top-grain leather, the chair offers a luxurious feel and long-lasting durability.
  • Metal Accents: Stainless steel or brass accents add a modern touch and enhance the sofa's overall durability.
  • High-Density Foam: The seat and backrest are padded with high-density foam, providing superior comfort and resilience.
  • Custom Finishes: Available in a range of finishes to perfectly match your interior decor.

Ultimate Comfort and Versatility

Designed with both aesthetics and comfort in mind, our luxury single sofa features an ergonomic design that provides excellent support for your back and body. The plush, padded seat and backrest ensure a comfortable sitting experience, making it perfect for relaxing, reading, or watching TV. Its sturdy construction guarantees that it can withstand daily use while maintaining its elegant appearance.

Features of a Modern and Durable Single Sofa

  • Comfort: Padded seat and backrest with high-density foam for superior comfort and support.
  • Stylish Design: Contemporary design with clean lines, perfect for modern interiors.
  • Easy Maintenance: Upholstered in stain-resistant fabric or leather that is easy to clean and maintain.
  • Versatility: Versatile design that complements various interior styles, from contemporary to classic.
  • Eco-friendly Materials: Made from sustainably sourced wood and eco-friendly upholstery.
  • Sturdy Construction: Reinforced joints and a solid frame ensure stability and durability.
  • Luxurious Feel: Upholstery provides a soft touch and adds a touch of elegance to your space.
This modern and luxury single chair is more than just a seating solution; it’s a statement of refined taste and sophisticated style. With its contemporary design, premium materials, and exceptional functionality, this sofa serves as the perfect addition to any room. Invest in this stunning single sofa and enjoy the perfect blend of elegance, comfort, and durability for years to come.

Name: CONFERENCE TABLE
Description:
Introducing this luxury conference table, the ultimate centerpiece for any professional meeting space. Designed to blend sophistication with functionality, this specially crafted table ensures that every meeting is conducted in an atmosphere of elegance and efficiency. Combining premium materials with a sleek, modern design, this conference table is perfect for executive boardrooms, upscale offices, and corporate meeting areas.

Sleek and Elegant Design

This luxury conference table features a sleek, contemporary design that exudes professionalism and sophistication. The clean lines, elegant silhouette, and refined finishes make it a stunning addition to any meeting space.

Premium Materials and Craftsmanship

  • High-Quality Wood: Constructed from premium solid wood and durable veneers, the table offers exceptional durability and a luxurious appearance.
  • Tempered Glass Surface: Features a tempered glass top option that provides a sleek, modern look and is easy to clean.
  • Metal Accents: Stainless steel or brass accents add a contemporary touch and enhance the table's overall durability.
  • Custom Finishes: Available in a range of finishes to perfectly match your office decor.

Functional and Versatile

Designed with both aesthetics and practicality in mind, our luxury conference table offers ample space and thoughtful features to facilitate productive meetings. The table includes integrated cable management solutions, ensuring a clutter-free workspace and easy access to power and data connections. Its sturdy construction guarantees stability and durability, making it ideal for daily use in busy corporate environments.

Features of a Luxury Conference Table

  • Durability: Constructed from high-quality materials like solid wood and tempered glass for long-lasting use.
  • Stylish Design: Contemporary design with clean lines, perfect for modern office interiors.
  • Easy Maintenance: Smooth surfaces and finishes that are easy to clean and maintain.
  • Ample Space: Spacious tabletop provides plenty of room for documents, laptops, and other meeting essentials.
  • Cable Management: Integrated cable management solutions for a tidy and organized workspace.
  • Versatile Functionality: Suitable for various office environments, from executive boardrooms to corporate meeting areas.
  • Stability: Designed with a stable base and sturdy legs, ensuring safety and stability.
  • Customizable Options: Available in various sizes and finishes to fit your specific needs and preferences.
  • Eco-friendly Materials: Made from sustainably sourced wood and recyclable materials, making it an environmentally conscious choice.
This luxury conference table is more than just a piece of office furniture; it’s a statement of refined taste and professional excellence. With its sleek design, premium materials, and exceptional functionality, this table serves as the perfect addition to any corporate meeting space. Invest in this stunning conference table and enjoy the perfect blend of elegance, practicality, and durability for years to come. Whether hosting executive meetings or team discussions, our luxury conference table promises to enhance your office environment with unmatched style and efficiency.

Description:
This modern and functional modern office workstation, designed to enhance productivity and style. This meticulously crafted piece combines contemporary design with exceptional practicality, making it the perfect addition to any office or home environment.

 Design

This workstation boasts a sleek, minimalist design that effortlessly complements a variety of interior styles. The clean lines and elegant silhouette make it a versatile piece that enhances both modern and traditional office settings.

Premium Materials and Craftsmanship

  • High-Quality Wood: Constructed from premium solid wood and durable veneers, the work station offers exceptional durability and a luxurious appearance.
  • Tempered Glass Surface: Features a tempered glass desktop that provides a sleek, modern look and is easy to clean.
  • Custom Finishes: Available in a range of finishes to perfectly match your office décor.

Functional and Versatile

Designed with both aesthetics and functionality in mind, this workstation offers ample storage and organizational features to keep your workspace tidy and efficient. The desk includes spacious drawers, shelves, and cable management solutions, ensuring all your office essentials are within easy reach and neatly organized. This versatile piece is suitable for various office environments, from corporate offices to home offices, and can be customized to fit your specific needs.

Features of a Modern and Durable Work Station

  • Durability: Constructed from high-quality materials like solid wood and tempered glass for long-lasting use.
  • Stylish Design: Contemporary design with clean lines, perfect for modern office interiors.
  • Easy Maintenance: Smooth surfaces and finishes that are easy to clean and maintain.
  • Ample Storage: Spacious drawers and shelves for organized storage of office supplies and documents.
  • Cable Management: Integrated cable management solutions for a clutter-free workspace.
  • Versatile Functionality: Suitable for various office environments, from corporate offices to home offices.
  • Stability: Designed with a stable base and sturdy legs, ensuring safety and stability.
  • Customizable Options: Available in various sizes and finishes to fit your specific needs and preferences.
  • Eco-friendly Materials: Made from sustainably sourced wood and recyclable materials, making it an environmentally conscious choice.
This modern and functional workstation is more than just a piece of office furniture; it’s a statement of productivity and style.  This workstation will serves as the perfect addition to any office environment. This modern and luxury leather sofa is  a balanced addition to any contemporary living space. . This leather sofa is designed to provide both style and functionality, ensuring it remains a timeless investment for years to come.

Contemporary and Elegant Design

This luxury leather sofa embodies the essence of modern elegance. Featuring clean lines and a minimalist silhouette, this sofa seamlessly integrates with various interior styles. The top-grain leather upholstery adds a touch of sophistication and luxury, creating a chic and inviting atmosphere in your living room.

Premium Materials and Craftsmanship

  • Top-Grain Leather: Upholstered in high-quality top-grain leather, known for its durability and luxurious feel.
  • Solid Wood Frame: Constructed from solid hardwood and steel, ensuring robust support and longevity.
  • High-Density Foam: Cushions filled with high-density foam provide superior comfort and resilience.
  • Stainless Steel Accents: Features stainless steel legs and accents, adding a sleek, modern touch.

Ultimate Comfort and Versatility

Designed with both aesthetics and comfort in mind, our luxury leather sofa offers ample seating space with plush, supportive cushions. The ergonomic design provides excellent support for your back and body, making it perfect for lounging, reading, or entertaining guests. Its sturdy construction ensures it can withstand daily use while maintaining its elegant appearance.

Features of a Modern and Durable Leather Sofa

  • Durability: Built with a solid hardwood frame, steel and high-quality leather to ensure long-lasting use.
  • Comfort: Cushions filled with high-density foam for superior comfort and support.
  • Stylish Design: Contemporary design with clean lines, perfect for modern interiors.
  • Easy Maintenance: Leather upholstery is easy to clean and maintain, ensuring the sofa looks pristine over time.
  • Versatility: Versatile design that complements various interior styles, from contemporary to classic.
  • Eco-friendly Materials: Made from sustainably sourced wood and eco-friendly leather.
  • Sturdy Construction: Reinforced joints and a solid frame ensure stability and durability.
  • Luxurious Feel: Top-grain leather provides a luxurious, soft touch and adds a touch of elegance to your living space.
This modern and luxury leather sofa is more than just a seating solution; it is a statement of refined taste and sophisticated style. With its contemporary design, premium materials, and exceptional functionality, this sofa serves as the perfect centerpiece for any living space.

Name: VAVA SUPREME ORTHOPAEDIC MATTRESS
Description:
Description:
Orthopedic 180x200 CM
The VAVA orthopaedic mattress offers great support and pressure relief to help reduce aches and pains.

BENEFITS OF VAVA ORTHOPAEDIC MATTRESS

  • For back and joint pain
The firm surface of The VAVA Orthopaedic Mattress promotes healthy posture alignment and pressure relief.
  • For those who like a firm sleep surface
If you simply prefer the feel and support of a firm mattress then The VAVA Orthopaedic Mattress is a good choice.

Benefits

  • Sealy PostureTech Core Support spring system for responsive support
  • Firm feeling orthopedic mattress
  • PowerPack zones for lumbar support
  • Unique EdgeGuard foam support improves durability and sleep space
  • Stylish new look damask cover
  • Mesh edge enhances breathability
  • Double sided - turn every three months
  • Four built-in turning handles
  • 100% recyclable
  • Depth: 29cm
  • 5 Year Guarantee

Description

Introducing brand new technology for unparalleled orthopaedic support.

Sealy support

The unique PostureTech Core Support spring system has been researched by medical professionals. Unlike traditional pocket springs, Sealy PostureTech Support springs get firmer under pressure. Providing tailored support for your whole body. Each spring can move to give responsive support focussing on the heaviest parts of your body.

Ortho packed

Zoned into three sections, the middle third of the mattress contains Sealy Power Pack technology. Denser springs within this zone provide added lumbar support for orthopaedic relief.

On the edge

Sleep or sit right on the edge of your new mattress, with no sag or roll off. The super sturdy reinforced sprung edge prevents that feeling of having a wall at the edge of your mattress. Instead, it cradles your weight for ultimate pressure relief.

A fresh look

The ultra comfortable mattress top is hand tufted for the perfect firmer feel. Finished with a striking modern damask cover for that plush touch. The mesh vented sides allow for enhanced breathability, helping your mattress stay clean and cool for longer.

Made to last

This mattress is double sided and can be flipped every few months to maximise comfort and longevity. The four vertical handles along the mattress edge make it easy to lift and manoeuvre with two people.

100% Recyclable

All Sealy Ortho mattresses are 100% recyclable at the end of their use, with no components going to landfill. Buy in confidence with the 5 Year manufacturer Guarantee.

Features

PostureTech Core Support Springs

Distributes weight evenly for excellent body support and pressure relief

 
Orthopaedic support

Specially designed to provide enhanced support and care for your back

 
Extra Firm

Our firmest rating. Highly supportive with a very firm, sturdy feel

 
Soft white fibres

Comfortable and great value for money

 
Reinforced mattress edge

Stable and sturdy so you can sleep right to the very edge

 
Includes turning handles

For easier moving and turning

 
29cm deep

About 11.4 inches deep

 
Damask cover

A finely woven and durable fabric

 
5 Year Guarantee

For your peace of mind

 
Fire Resistant

This product conforms to BS7177: 2008, for use at home

Approved by the National Bed Federation

Name: Modern Center table ( 5118 )
Description:
Marble TOP This design of our luxury center table is inspired by modern aesthetics, featuring clean lines and a minimalist silhouette that exudes sophistication. The table boasts a seamless blend of glass, metal, creating a visually striking piece that complements a variety of interior styles. The tempered glass top provides a sleek, reflective surface, enhancing the room's sense of space and light.

Premium Materials

  • Tempered Marble: The top is made from high-quality tempered marble, known for its durability and resistance to scratches and heat.
  • Stainless Steel: The legs and frame are crafted from stainless steel, ensuring stability and a modern aesthetic.

Functional and Stylish

Designed with functionality in mind, this center table offers ample surface area for displaying decorative items, holding beverages, or serving snacks. Its sturdy construction ensures it can withstand daily use while maintaining its elegant appearance.

Features of this Durable and Modern Center Table

  • Durability: Constructed from robust materials like tempered glass and stainless steel, ensuring long-lasting use.
  • Stylish Design: Contemporary design with clean lines, suitable for modern interiors.
  • Easy Maintenance: Smooth surfaces that are easy to clean, ensuring the table looks pristine with minimal effort.
  • Versatile Functionality: Ample surface area for various uses, from displaying décor to holding beverages.
  • Stability: Designed with a stable base and sturdy legs, preventing wobbling and ensuring safety.
  • Scratch and Heat Resistant: The tempered marble top is resistant to scratches and heat, maintaining its beauty over time.
This modern and luxury center table is more than just a piece of furniture; it’s a centerpiece that elevates the elegance of your living space. With its sleek design, premium materials, and exceptional functionality, it is the perfect addition to any contemporary home. Invest in this stunning center table and enjoy a blend of style and practicality that will stand the test of time.

Sizes: 80CM and 120CM Elevate your bathroom experience with these collection of quality luxury bathroom accessories, designed to bring sophistication, functionality, and style to your space. These carefully curated accessories, crafted from premium materials and featuring elegant designs, transform any bathroom into a spa-like sanctuary.

Elegant and Timeless Design

This luxury bathroom accessories are meticulously designed to complement any bathroom decor, from modern minimalism to classic elegance. With smooth lines, refined finishes, and attention to detail, these accessories add a stylish touch that elevates your bathroom's ambiance.
  • Premium Finishes: Available in finishes such as brushed nickel, chrome, matte black, and gold, designed to resist tarnishing and maintain their shine.
  • Versatile Aesthetic: Suited to a range of styles, ensuring a seamless look for any bathroom.
  • Sleek Profiles: Compact and elegant shapes that maximize space without overwhelming your decor.

Durability and High-Quality Materials

  • Rust and Corrosion Resistance: Made from stainless steel, brass, and ceramic materials that are resistant to moisture and wear.
  • Easy Maintenance: High-quality finishes that prevent fingerprints, water spots, and stains, keeping the accessories looking pristine with minimal cleaning.
  • Scratch and Chip Resistant: Durable materials and finishes that prevent scratches and chips, preserving the elegant look over time.

Functional and User-Friendly

Beyond aesthetics, these luxury bathroom accessories offer functionality that enhances daily routines. With thoughtful details and practical designs, each piece is easy to use and enhances bathroom organization and convenience.
  • Multi-Purpose Functionality: From towel racks to soap dispensers and toothbrush holders, our accessories are designed for ease of use.
  • Secure Installation: Accessories come with secure mounting hardware to ensure stability and longevity.
  • Ample Storage Options: Features like extra hooks, trays, and holders for added organization, reducing countertop clutter.

Eco-Friendly and Safe

These bathroom accessories are crafted with sustainability and safety in mind, using materials that are eco-conscious and safe for family use.
  • Eco-Friendly Materials: Made from recyclable and sustainably sourced materials.
  • Non-Toxic Finishes: Free from harmful chemicals, safe for all household members.
Transform your bathroom into a luxurious retreat with these quality luxury bathroom accessories. From their elegant design and durable materials to practical functionality, these accessories offer both beauty and convenience, creating a polished and inviting space.

Name: High Quality Waterproof Laminated Floor 2.0-  FDL-17
Description:
Price /m2 Dimension of the sheet:  122*20*0.8cm Please Note: Price is per Square Meter ( You can get in touch with us or visit any of our showrooms for clarification ) Elevate your floor design with our high-quality laminated flooring, designed to combine elegance with exceptional durability. Featuring a robust wear layer that withstands heavy foot traffic, our flooring is perfect for busy households and commercial spaces alike. The high-definition imaging provides a realistic appearance of natural wood, stone, or tile, adding a touch of sophistication to any room. Installation is a breeze with our easy-to-use click-lock system, making it a perfect DIY project. Maintenance is effortless, with surfaces that resist stains and are easy to clean, ensuring your floors remain beautiful with minimal effort. Available in a variety of colors, patterns, and textures, our laminated flooring offers a stylish solution to match any decor.

Some Features of our High-Quality Laminated Floor

Durability

  • Wear Resistance: A high-quality laminated floor should have a robust wear layer that can withstand heavy foot traffic and resist scratches, scuffs, and stains.
  • Impact Resistance: The flooring should be able to endure the impact of falling objects without denting or chipping.

Aesthetic Appeal

  • Realistic Designs: The surface should have high-definition imaging that mimics the look of natural materials like wood, stone, or tile, providing a realistic and attractive appearance.
  • Variety of Styles: Available in a wide range of colors, patterns, and textures to match any interior decor.

Easy Installation

  • Click-Lock System: Features an easy-to-use interlocking system that allows for quick and hassle-free installation without the need for glue or nails.
  • DIY Friendly: Designed to be installed by homeowners without professional assistance, making it cost-effective and convenient.

Maintenance

  • Easy to Clean: Requires minimal maintenance, with surfaces that can be easily wiped or mopped clean without special cleaning products.
  • Stain Resistance: The protective layer helps prevent stains from penetrating, making spills easy to clean up.

Moisture Resistance

  • Waterproof Options: High-quality laminated floors should include options that are water-resistant or waterproof, suitable for installation in areas like kitchens, bathrooms, and basements.
  • Moisture Barrier: Some floors come with an integrated underlayment that provides additional moisture protection.

Comfort and Safety

  • Underfoot Comfort: Includes features like cushioned layers or integrated underlayment to enhance comfort when walking.
  • Slip Resistance: Designed with a textured surface to provide better traction and reduce the risk of slipping.

Environmental Considerations

  • Eco-Friendly Materials: Made from sustainable materials and produced with environmentally friendly practices.
  • Low VOC Emissions: Certified for low volatile organic compound (VOC) emissions to ensure better indoor air quality.

Warranty and Support

  • Long Warranty: Offers extensive warranties that cover wear, staining, and fading, providing peace of mind for long-term use.
  • Customer Support: Backed by strong customer service and support from the manufacturer, ensuring help is available if needed.

Key Features

  • High-quality laminated floor
  • Durable laminated flooring
  • Wear-resistant laminate
  • Waterproof laminate flooring
  • Easy installation laminate
  • Realistic laminate designs
  • Low maintenance laminate
  • Eco-friendly laminate
  • Comfortable laminated floor
  • Slip-resistant laminate

Name: Oil Paint  (1.40*80)
Description: Size : 1.40*80

Name: Oil Paint
Description:
This paint oil offers the perfect solution for woodworkers, home decorators  etc.  looking to achieve a high-quality finish that enhances the longevity and beauty of any surface. Known for its rich consistency and exceptional durability, this oil-based paint provides superior coverage and a smooth, professional finish for various projects.

Rich Color and Coverage

The unique formulation of this  paint oil offers unmatched color depth and vibrancy, creating a lasting impression. Each stroke lays down a rich, intense pigment that doesn’t fade, providing consistent coverage that is ideal for both detailed artwork and large surfaces.
  • Deep Pigmentation: Produces vivid, consistent color that stands the test of time.
  • Smooth Application: Provides excellent flow, allowing easy application and blending.
  • Versatile Use: Ideal for use on wood, metal, canvas, and wall surfaces.

Long-Lasting Durability

This paint oil is formulated for resilience, ensuring your project remains beautiful for years.  Its long-lasting qualities make it perfect for both indoor and outdoor use, as it withstands environmental factors like humidity, sunlight, and temperature changes.
  • Weather Resistance: Holds up against the elements, ideal for outdoor projects.
  • Fade Resistance: Maintains its color and finish, even in direct sunlight.
  • Scratch and Chip Resistance: Protects against minor impacts and wear, ensuring a durable surface.

High-Quality Finish

This paint oil delivers a smooth, glossy finish that brings out the natural texture of surfaces, enhancing their beauty and appeal. The finish can be customized from high-gloss to matte, allowing you to achieve the exact look you desire. The oil-based formula also adds a layer of protection, sealing the surface to prevent damage and improve durability.
  • Gloss Options: Choose from a high-gloss, semi-gloss, or matte finish.
  • Protective Sealant: Acts as a barrier against moisture and stains.
  • Enhanced Texture: Brings out wood grain and other textures beautifully.

Conclusion

This premium paint oil offers a blend of beauty, durability, and versatility that makes it ideal for a variety of projects. Whether you’re painting walls, furniture, or art pieces, this paint oil ensures a flawless, vibrant finish that lasts.
